Warning.SelectType: Для створення має бути обраний тип {name}.

DND5E.title: Dungeon & Dragons Fifth Edition

Bonuses.Label: Бонуси {ability}
Bonuses.Hint: These bonuses apply to checks & saves made with {ability}.

Global.Label: Глобальні бонуси
Global.Hint: Ці бонуси застосовуються до перевірок і ряткидків з будь-якою характеристикою.

DND5E.AbilityConfigurationHint: Налаштуйте володіння рятівних кидків здібностей, бонуси рятівних кидків і бонуси перевірок.
DND5E.AbilityCheckGlobalBonusHint: Цей бонус застосовується до всіх перевірок здібностей, зроблених цим персонажем.
DND5E.ActionWarningNoToken: Ви повинні контролювати один або більше токенів, щоб використати цю опцію.

override.label: Перевизначити активацію
override.hint: Використовувати ці значення активації замість значень предмета при використанні.

type.label: Вартість Активації
type.hint: Тип активації (наприклад, дія, легендарна дія, хвилини).

Warning.NoActions: No {type} are available, but activating this requires at least {required}.
Warning.NotEnoughActions: Not enough {type} to activate, {required} required but only {available} available.

statuses.label: Стани
statuses.hint: Поки діє цей Активний Ефект, ціль вважається такою, що має ці додаткові стани.

chatFlavor.label: Опис в чаті
chatFlavor.hint: Додатковий текст, що відображається в повідомленні чату.

Warning.UsageNotAllowed: Using this activity isn't currently possible.

DND5E.ActorWarningSingleton: Лише один {itemType} може бути доданий до {actorType}.
DND5E.ActiveEffectOverrideWarning: Це значення змінено активним ефектом і не може бути редаговане. Вимкніть ефект, щоб його редагувати.
DND5E.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Чи бажаєте ви додати ці предмети до аркуша персонажа?

Feat.Hint: Перетягніть уміння сюди або оберіть одне замість підвищити значення здібностей.

cap.label: Ліміт очок
cap.hint: Максимальна кількість очок, яку гравець може надати одній здібності.

fixed.label: Фіксоване покращення
fixed.hint: Здібності, які покращуються на фіксоване значення і не можуть бути покращені вручну.

points.label: Очки
points.hint: Кількість очок, на які можна збільшити будь-яке розблоковане значення здібності.

AbilityScoreImprovement.Hint: Дозволити гравцю збільшити одне або декілька очок здібностей або обрати опціональне уміння.

Journal.DescriptionLegacy:
When you reach {firstLevelOrdinal} level, and again at {otherLevelsOrdinal} level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can’t increase an ability score above {maxAbilityScore} using this feature.

Using the optional feats rule, you can forgo taking this feature to take a feat of your choice instead.
Journal.DescriptionModern: You gain the Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat of your choice for which you qualify. You gain this feature again at {class} levels {otherLevels}.
Journal.Name: Ability Score Improvement

AbilityScoreImprovement.LockedHint: Значення не можна змінити, якщо було обрано уміння.
AbilityScoreImprovement.Title: Підвищити значення здібностей

Warning.Level: Щоб отримати це уміння, ви маєте досягти принаймні {level} рівня.

HitPoints.Hint: Track the player's hit points for each level in the class.
HitPoints.Title: Hit Points

Warning.Empty: Hit points must be rolled or the average value must be taken.
Warning.Invalid: Hit points must be a valid whole number.

ItemChoice.DropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list that can be chosen with this advancement.

allowDrops.hint: Allow players to be able to drop their own choices into this advancement.
allowDrops.label: Allow Drops

choices.hint: Specify how many choices are allowed at each level.
choices.label: Choices

level.hint: Only allow choices from spells of this level.
level.label: Spell Level

type.hint: Restrict what Item types can be chosen.
type.label: Item Type

ItemChoice.Hint: Present the player with a choice of items (such as equipment, features, or spells) that they can choose for their character at one or more levels.
ItemChoice.Title: Choose Items

Warning.FeatureLevel: Must be at least level {level} to take this feature.
Warning.InvalidType: Only {type} items can be selected for this choice.
Warning.NoOriginal: Previously selected choice no longer available for replacement.
Warning.PreviouslyChosen: This item has already been chosen at a previous level.
Warning.SpellLevelAvailable: Only {level} or lower spells can be chosen for this advancement.
Warning.SpellLevelSpecific: Only {level} spells can be chosen for this advancement.

ItemGrant.DropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list granted by this advancement.

optional.label: Optional
optional.hint: If the whole advancement is marked optional, players may opt out of any of the following items, otherwise all non-optional items are granted.

ItemGrant.Hint: Grant the character items (such as equipment, features, or spells) when they reach a certain level.
ItemGrant.Title: Grant Items

Warning.Container: Container contents will not be added with containers.
Warning.Duplicate: That item already exists on this advancement.
Warning.Recursive: You cannot grant an item in its own advancement.

ClosePrompt.Message: If the advancement process is cancelled, choices made so far will be discarded and no changes will be made to the actor.
ClosePrompt.Title: Stop Advancement

RestartPrompt.Message: Are you sure you wish to undo all choices so far?
RestartPrompt.Title: Restart Advancement Choices

Migration.Hint: Select which of the following advancements will be added to {name}.
Migration.Title: Migrate Advancement

ScaleValue.Hint: A single value that changes as a class increases in level that is made available in roll formulas (such as a Monk's martial arts die).
ScaleValue.Title: Scale Value

CR.Hint: Use this for representing creature challenge ratings for features like Wild Shape
CR.Label: Challenge Rating

Dice.Hint: Use this for dice values like bardic inspiration, sneak attack, or superiority dice.
Dice.Identifier:
This scale value for the current level will be available in a formula using:
@scale.{class}.{identifier} - whole formula (4d6)
@scale.{class}.{identifier}.die - whole die (d6)
@scale.{class}.{identifier}.number - number of dice (4)
@scale.{class}.{identifier}.faces - number of faces (6)
Dice.Label: Dice

Distance.Hint: Use this for numerical values that represent a distance, such as unarmored movement speed, or aura of protection radius.
Distance.Label: Distance

Number.Hint: Use this for purely numerical values like rage damage bonus or number of uses per day.
Number.Label: Numeric

String.Hint: Use this if you are unsure of the type of the scale values, or if the type does not matter.
String.Identifier:
This scale value for the current level will be available in a formula using:
@scale.{class}.{identifier}
String.Label: Anything

requireSlot.label: Require Slot
requireSlot.hint: Require a spell slot to be spent when using the limited uses. If not checked then the uses will be additional free uses that don't consume a slot.

Subclass.Hint: Вкажіть, на якому рівні цього класу можна отримати підклас.
Subclass.Title: Підклас

allowReplacements.hint: If a trait is already set on the actor, allow the player to choose from any other trait as a replacement.
allowReplacements.label: Allow Replacements

choices.hint: The following traits will be presented as a choice to the player.
choices.label: Choices

grants.hint: The following traits will be granted to the character as long as they don't already possess that trait.
grants.label: Guaranteed

Trait.Hint: Grant a character certain traits or give them an option to select traits (such as proficiencies, skills, languages).

Expertise.Hint: Gain expertise in a trait in which you already have proficiency.
Expertise.Label: Expertise

Force.Hint: Gain expertise in a trait regardless of your previous proficiency level.
Force.Label: Forced Expertise

Mastery.Hint: Gain mastery with a weapon in which you already have proficiency.
Mastery.Label: Mastery

Upgrade.Hint: Gain proficiency in a trait unless you already have it, otherwise gain expertise.
Upgrade.Label: Upgrade

Trait.Title: Traits

DND5E.AdvancementConfigureAllowDropsHint: Should players be able to drop their own choices into this advancement?
DND5E.AdvancementConfigureDropAreaHint: Drop Items here to add them to the pool from which a player can choose.
DND5E.AdvancementDeleteConfirmationMessa: Видалення цього елементу також призведе до видалення всіх вибраних варіантів розвитку. Ці зміни будуть видалені з вашого персонажа, якщо прапорець нижче встановлено.
DND5E.AdvancementFlowDropAreaHint: Drop an Item here to choose it.
DND5E.AdvancementItemTypeInvalidWarning: {type} items cannot be added with this advancement type.
DND5E.AdvancementLevelDownConfirmationMe: Пониження рівня цього класу також видалить всі вибрані варіанти розвитку. Ці зміни будуть застосовані до персонажа, якщо прапорець нижче встановлено.
DND5E.ArmorConfigHint: Заповніть поле вище для перезапису автоматичного розрахунку класу захисту.

ability.label: Attack Ability
ability.hint: Ability used for make the attack and determine damage. Available using @mod in formulas.

bonus.label: To Hit Bonus
bonus.hint: Bonus added to the to hit roll for the attack.

threshold.label: Critical Threshold
threshold.hint: Minimum value on the D20 needed to roll a critical hit.

flat.label: Flat To Hit
flat.hint: Ignore the ability modifier, proficiency, and any other bonuses from the actor and only use the bonus defined by the activity when calculating to hit.

value.label: Attack Type
value.hint: Is this a melee or ranged attack?

classification.label: Attack Classification
classification.hint: Is this an unarmed, weapon, or spell attack?

bonus.label: Extra Critical Damage
bonus.hint: Extra damage applied when a critical is rolled. Added to the base damage or first damage part.

includeBase.label: Include Base Damage
includeBase.hint: Include the item's base damage with any additional damage parts.

parts.label: Damage Parts
parts.hint: Individual damage parts to include with the roll.

Warning.NoQuantity: Attempting to attack with a weapon with a quantity of zero.

DND5E.Award.Title: Distribute Award
DND5E.Award.NoPrimaryParty: No primary party set, displaying characters assigned to players instead.
DND5E.Award.NotGMError: The /award command is only available to GMs.
DND5E.Award.UnrecognizedWarning: Unable to parse {commands}. The /award command should be used with XP & currencies values such as '/award 10gp 50xp'.

Attack.NoActorWarning: No character selected as target of the attack. Either select a token, or open their character sheet.

Deaths.one: {deaths} defender was slain in an attack on their bastion!
Deaths.other: {deaths} defenders were slain in an attack on their bastion!

Result.NoDeaths: Fended off an attack on their bastion with no casualties!

Attack.Title: Bastion Attack

Button.Label: Show Bastion Turn Button
Button.Hint: Display a button for advancing bastion turns in the main game interface.

Configuration.Name: Bastions
Configuration.Label: Configure Bastions
Configuration.Hint: Various configuration options for the Bastion system as presented in the DMG 2024.

Enabled.Label: Enable Bastion Functionality
Enabled.Hint: When enabled, player characters will have access to a new Bastion tab on their character sheets when reaching level 5, and will be able to build facilities and issue orders to them.

Summary.NoOrders: No orders issued to special facilities this turn.

Trade.Invalid: Removing a pending trade will invalidate your trade order.

bonuses.label: Глобальні бонуси
bonuses.hint: Global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls.

ability.label: Casting Ability
ability.hint: Ability to override the creature's normal spellcasting ability.

attack.label: Attack Bonus
attack.hint: Flat to hit bonus in place of the spell's normal attack bonus.

save.label: Save DC
save.hint: Flat DC to use in place of the spell's normal save DC.

override.label: Override Values
override.hint: Override the spell's normal attack bonus & DC when casting.

level.label: Casting Level
level.hint: Base level to cast the spell, if different than the spell's level.

properties.label: Ignored Properties
properties.hint: Spell components & tags to ignore while casting.

spellbook.label: Display in Spellbook
spellbook.hint: Display spell in the Spells tab of the character sheet.

DND5E.Controls.Hint: Enable various hints throughout the UI for certain mouse and keyboard controls.
DND5E.Controls.Name: Enable Control Hints

Activity.FastForwardHint: <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <left-click> the item to skip this dialog

ability.label: Check Ability
ability.hint: Ability to use when making the check.

associated.label: Associated Skills or Tools
associated.hint: Present ability checks using proficiency and bonuses with these skills or tools.

calculation.label: DC Calculation
calculation.hint: Method or ability used to calculate the difficulty class.

formula.label: DC Formula
formula.hint: Custom formula or flat value for defining the check DC.

additional.label: Additional Hit Dice
additional.hint: Formula for hit dice that are available for this class beyond the normal amount.

all.label: Require All
all.hint: Require all primary abilities to meet the minimum in order to multi-class.

value.label: Primary Ability
value.hint: Abilities used most by this class. Used to determine multi-classing restrictions.

DND5E.ClassIdentifierHint: Дані цього класу будуть доступні через @classes.{identifier} в формулах кидків.
DND5E.ClassMakeOriginalHint: Перший клас, обраний персонажем, використовується для визначення певних класових рис під час мультикласу.

Warning.Range: Must select between {min} and {max} documents, {value} selected.

Sources.Name: Compendium Browser Sources

DND5E.ContainerDeleteMessage: This container will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered and the {count} items contained within will be moved out.
DND5E.ContainerDeleteContents: Also delete all items within the container.
DND5E.ContainerMaxDepth: Containers cannot be nested more than {depth} levels deep.

RiderConditions.label: Окремі стани
RiderConditions.hint: Коли цей Активний Ефект застосовується, ці додаткові стани накладаються окремо.

DND5E.ConcentrationBreakWarning: Breaking concentration on an effect that is active on other creatures requires an active GM to be present.
DND5E.ConcentratingOn: You are maintaining concentration on the effects of the '{name}' {type}.
DND5E.ConcentratingEndChoice: You are concentrating on effects from more than one source. Pick which effect to end.
DND5E.ConcentratingMissingItem: The effect that is concentrated on and to be replaced does not exist.
DND5E.ConcentratingLimited: You are not able to begin concentrating on an additional effect.
DND5E.ConcentratingWarnLimit: You cannot maintain concentration on more effects!
DND5E.ConcentratingWarnLimitOptional: You may end concentration on one of your maintained effects to use this item.
DND5E.ConcentratingWarnLimitZero: You are not able to maintain concentration on any effects!
DND5E.ConcentrationConfigurationHint: Configure concentration modifiers and bonuses which apply to this creature.
DND5E.ConsumeScalingTooltip: If checked, consuming additional resources will increase the level the spell is cast at.

replace.label: Replace Weapon Damage
replace.hint: Replace base weapon damage with this damage rather than augmenting it.

autoDestroy.label: Destroy on Empty
autoDestroy.hint: Reduce the item's quantity by 1 whenever all of its limited uses are expended.

DND5E.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: Це останній заряд цього предмету, та його використання зменшить кількість цих предметів на 1

allowed.label: Allow Scaling
allowed.hint: Can an activity not on a spell be activated at higher levels?

max.label: Max Scaling
max.hint: Maximum number of scaling levels for this item, including the base level.

spellSlot.label: Consume Spell Slot
spellSlot.hint: Should using this activity consume a slot for this spell?

targets.label: Consumption Targets
targets.hint: Targets of possible consumption when this activity is activated.

value.label: Consumption Amount
value.hint: Enter a negative value to restore rather than consume.

formula.label: Scaling Formula
formula.hint: Custom scaling of consumption amount per level.

Warning.MissingAttribute: Attribute {attribute} configured to be consumed by {activity} activity on {item} could not be found.
Warning.MissingHitDice: Actor does not have a class with a {denomination} hit die.
Warning.MissingItem: Item configured to be consumed by {activity} activity on {item} could not be found.
Warning.NotEnough: Not enough {type} available to spend, {cost} required and only {available} available.
Warning.WillDestroy: Consuming {item} will spend its final use and it will be destroyed.

Convert.Label: Convert
Convert.Hint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.

Error.InsufficientFunds: Failed to deduct {amount}{denomination} from {name}. Insufficient funds.

allow.label: Allow Critical
allow.hint: Should the creature be able to roll critical damage?

bonus.label: Extra Critical Damage
bonus.hint: Extra damage applied to the first damage part when a critical is rolled.

parts.label: Damage Parts
parts.hint: Individual damage parts to include with the roll.

bonus.label: Damage Bonus
bonus.hint: Bonus added to the damage roll.

enabled.label: Enable Custom Formula
enabled.hint: Use a custom formula rather than the default dice.

denomination.label: Die Denomination
denomination.hint: Denomination of the dice to roll.

mode.label: Scaling Mode
mode.hint: Method by which the scaling increase is calculated.

number.label: Dice Scaling
number.hint: Number of dice to increase for each scaling step. Will be applied to the first die found in the damage formula if more than one is present.

formula.label: Scaling Formula
formula.hint: Arbitrary scaling formula that will be multiplied for each scaling step and added to the original formula.

types.label: Типи шкоди
types.hint: Type of damage inflicted or multiple for the user to select from.

DND5E.DamageModification.Label: Модифікатор шкоди
DND5E.DamageModification.Hint:
Формули значень, які буде додано до ушкоджень певного типу, застосованих до цього актора.
Від’ємні значення зменшуватимуть отримані ушкодження.
DND5E.DamageModification.BypassHint: These weapon properties will bypass damage modification for physical damage.

DND5E.DamagePhysicalBypassHint: Властивості цієї зброї долатимуть стійкість до фізичних ушкоджень.
DND5E.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: {name} досяг критичного успіху в рятівному кидку від смерті та відновив 1 ПЗ!
DND5E.DeathSaveSuccess: {name} виживає з 3 успішними рятівними кидками від смерті!
DND5E.DeathSaveFailure: {name} гине з 3 проваленими рятівними кидками від смерті!
DND5E.DeathSaveUnnecessary: Вам не потрібно проходити рятівні кидки від смерті, тому що у вас більше ніж 0 ПЗ або вже 3 успіхи.
DND5E.DocumentUseWarn: You lack permission to use an item on this document.
DND5E.DocumentViewWarn: You lack permission to view this document.

concentration.label: Концентрація
concentration.hint: Істота повинна підтримувати концентрацію, поки ефект активний.

override.label: Override Duration
override.hint: Use these duration values instead of the item's when using this activity.

special.label: Special Duration
special.hint: Description of any special duration details.

value.label: Duration Value
value.hint: Value of the duration in the specified units, if applicable.

DND5E.EFFECT.Empty: No associated effects. Use the button above to create one, or select an existing effect from the drop-down.
DND5E.EFFECT.Label: Available Effects

DND5E.EffectApplyWarningConcentration: Applying an effect that is being concentrated on by another character requires GM permissions.
DND5E.EffectApplyWarningOwnership: Effects cannot be applied to tokens you are not the owner of.

DND5E.ENCHANT.Title: Зачарувати

level.label: Level Limit
level.hint: Range of levels required to use this enchantment.

activity.label: Additional Activities
activity.hint: These additional activities will be added to the enchanted item when this enchantment is applied, and removed when the enchantment is removed.

effect.label: Additional Effects
effect.hint: These additional effects will be added to the enchanted item when this enchantment is applied, and removed when the enchantment is removed.

item.label: Additional Items
item.hint: These additional items will be added to the creature when one of its items is enchanted, and will be removed if the enchantment is ever removed.

level.label: Level Limit
level.hint: Range of levels required to use this enchantment.

activity.label: Additional Activities
activity.hint: These additional activities will be added to the enchanted item when this enchantment is applied, and removed when the enchantment is removed.

effect.label: Additional Effects
effect.hint: These additional effects will be added to the enchanted item when this enchantment is applied, and removed when the enchantment is removed.

item.label: Additional Items
item.hint: These additional items will be added to the creature when one of its items is enchanted, and will be removed if the enchantment is ever removed.

identifier.label: Class Identifier
identifier.hint: Identifier used to determine whether the character level or a specific class level should be used for enchantment level limits.

restrictions.label: Restrictions
restrictions.hint: Restrictions on the type of item to which this enchantment can be applied.

allowMagical.label: Allow Magical
allowMagical.hint: Allow items that are already magical to be enchanted.

categories.label: Valid Categories
categories.hint: Specific item categories to which this enchantment can be applied.

properties.label: Valid Properties
properties.hint: Specific item properties which must be present for this enchantment to be applied.

type.label: Item Type
type.hint: Type of item to which this enchantment can be applied.

DND5E.ENCHANT.DropArea: Place item here to enchant it…

Enchantment.Empty: No associated enchantments. Use the button above to create one, or select an existing enchantment from the drop-down.

Warning.ConcentrationEnded: Cannot apply this enchantment because concentration has ended.
Warning.MissingProperty: Item must have one of these properties to be enchanted: {validProperties}.
Warning.NoMagicalItems: Items that are already magical cannot be enchanted.
Warning.NoSubtype: Only {allowedType} items can be enchanted by this enchantment, but this item doesn't have a sub-type.
Warning.WrongType: {incorrectType} items cannot be enchanted by this enchantment, only {allowedType} items are allowed.

max.label: Item Limit
max.hint: Formula for the maximum number of enchantments of this type that can be active at a time.

period.label: Replacement Period
period.hint: How frequently the enchantments of this type can be re-bound to different items.

Warning.NotOnActor: Enchantments can only be added to items, not directly to actors.
Warning.Override: This value is being modified by an Enchantment and cannot be edited. Disable the enchantment in the effects tab to edit it.

BaseItem.Label: Purchase Base Item
BaseItem.Hint: If checked, the base item will be purchased at full price instead of crafted.

Craft.Hint: The items that this facility is currently in the process of crafting or harvesting, if any.

built.label: Built
built.hint: Basic facilities must be built first before they can be used.

disabled.hint: Disabled facilities cannot be issued orders and are repaired at the beginning of the next turn.
disabled.label: Disabled

enlargeable.hint: Certain special facilities may have their size categories increased for a cost.
enlargeable.label: Can Be Enlarged

free.hint: Free facilities do not count towards your special facilities cap.
free.label: Free Facility

stocked.hint: Appropriate for facilities that do not store a variable value of goods, but are instead considered either stocked or empty.
stocked.label: Stocked

Creatures.Buy: Drop animals that you wish to purchase into the slots above, and update the cost appropriately below.

Price.Label: Base Price
Price.Hint: Select which stock to sell, and input the base price above.

Stocked.Label: Fully Stock
Stocked.Hint: Input the required cost to fully stock this facility below.

cover.label: Cover
cover.hint: Cover provided to crew by this vehicle feature.

Warning.NoActivity: Linked activity must be configured before Forward activity can be used.

DND5E.EffectUnavailableInfo: Предмет з ефектом повинен бути споряджений або налаштований для активації
DND5E.FilterNoSpells: Чари за цим фільтром не знайдені.
DND5E.NoSpellLevels: У цього персонажа немає рівнів чаротворця, але ви можете додати чари самі.

EnhancedDualWielding.Name: Enhanced Dual Wielding
EnhancedDualWielding.Hint: Allow bonus action extra attacks using any melee weapon without the Two-Handed property.

DND5E.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the D&D Fifth Edition system.
DND5E.FlagsDiamondSoulHint: Отримуєте майстерність у всіх рятівних кидках.
DND5E.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Додатковий кубик к20 при перевірках Спр, Інт, Мдр і Хар з перевагою.
DND5E.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Повторний кидок при випаденні одиниці на перевірках к20.
DND5E.FlagsJOATHint: Половина бонусу майстерності до перевірок не опанованих здібностей.
DND5E.FlagsObservantHint: Надає +5 для пасивних Уважності та Розслідування.
DND5E.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Половина бонусу майстерності (округленої в більшу сторону) у перевірках фізичних здібностей та ініціативи.
DND5E.FlagsWeaponCritThresholdHint: Розширений поріг, при якому відбувається критична атака зброєю.
DND5E.FlagsSpellCritThresholdHint: Розширений поріг, при якому відбувається критична атака заклинанням.
DND5E.FlagsMeleeCriticalDice: Критичні кістки ушкоджень у ближньому бою
DND5E.FlagsMeleeCriticalDiceHint: Число додаткових кісток ушкодження, що додаються до критичних влучань  у ближньому бою.
DND5E.FormulaMissingReferenceWarn: The {property} formula within {name} has references to missing data: {references}

bonus.label: Healing Bonus
bonus.hint: Bonus added to the healing roll.

enabled.label: Enable Custom Formula
enabled.hint: Should the custom formula be used rather than the default dice.

denomination.label: Die Denomination
denomination.hint: Denomination of the dice to roll.

mode.label: Scaling Mode
mode.hint: Method by which the scaling increase is calculated.

number.label: Dice Scaling
number.hint: Number of dice to increase for each scaling step. Will be applied to the first die found in the healing formula if more than one is present.

formula.label: Scaling Formula
formula.hint: Arbitrary scaling formula that will be multiplied for each scaling step and added to the original formula.

types.label: Healing Types
types.hint: Type of healing inflicted or multiple for the user to select from.

DND5E.HitPointsOverrideHint: Override automatically calculated hit points, ignoring any HP from classes, bonuses, and ability modifier.
DND5E.HitPointsTempMaxHint: Temporary change to the maximum HP.
DND5E.HPFormulaError: The provided hit point formula could not be evaluated.
DND5E.HitDiceConfigHint: Налаштуйте кістки здоров'я для кожного класу.
DND5E.IdentifierError: Ідентифікатор може містити лише літери (a-z), цифри (0-9), дефіси (-), і підкреслення (_).
DND5E.InitiativeConfigHint: Configure initiative modifiers and bonuses which apply to this Actor.
DND5E.ItemAttackFlatHint: If checked, don't add proficiency, ability modifier, or any other bonuses to attack roll except what is included here.
DND5E.ItemRecoveryFormulaWarning: Unable to recover uses for {name}. Invalid recovery formula '{formula}' ({uuid}).

DND5E.LegendaryAction.DescriptionLegacy: The {name} can take {usesNamed}, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The {name} regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
DND5E.LegendaryAction.Label: Легендарна дія

DND5E.LimitedUsesPromptTooltip: If unchecked, the prompt to consume an available use will be suppressed.
DND5E.MaxCharacterLevelExceededWarn: Персонаж не може отримати рівень вище {max}.
DND5E.MaxClassLevelExceededWarn: Клас не може отримати рівень вище {max}.
DND5E.MaxClassLevelMinimumWarn: У класі повинен бути хоча б один рівень.
DND5E.ModuleArtConfigH: Configure which module-provided art should be used.
DND5E.ModuleArtPriorityHint: Use the arrows to adjust the priority of the art sources. When a single Actor has art provided from multiple sources, the one with the highest priority will be used.
DND5E.Name: Ім'я персонажа

important.hint: Important NPCs track death saves, hit dice, and loyalty (if enabled). Any NPC with class levels is considered important regardless of this setting.
important.label: Important NPC

level.label: Необхідний рівень
level.hint: Рівень персонажа або класу, необхідний для вибору цього уміння при підвищенні рівня.

repeatable.hint: Це уміння можна вибрати більше одного разу.
repeatable.label: Може повторюватися

long.label: Long Range
long.hint: Far attack range of the weapon, if present on the weapon.

override.label: Override Range
override.hint: Use these range values instead of the item's when using this activity.

special.label: Special Range
special.hint: Description of any special range details.

value.label: Range Value
value.hint: Value of the range in the specified units, if applicable.

DND5E.RechargeShort: Recharge after a Short or Long Rest

AutoSpend.Hint: Automatically spend hit dice until they run out or health is full.
AutoSpend.Label: Auto Spend HD

HitDice.None: No Hit Dice remaining to roll during this rest.

Hint.Group: On a long rest group members will recover hit points, hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
Hint.GroupLegacy: On a long rest group members will recover hit points, half of their maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
Hint.Normal: On a long rest you will recover hit points, hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
Hint.NormalLegacy: On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.

Result.Full: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} and {dice}.
Result.HitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice}.
Result.HitPoints: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health}.

NewDay.Hint: Recover limited use abilities which recharge at dusk, dawn, or on a new day.
NewDay.Label: New Day

Hint.Group: On a short rest group members can spend Hit Dice and will recover item uses.
Hint.Normal: On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover item uses.

Result.Full: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} to recover {health}.

DND5E.MovementConfigHint: Налаштування швидкості переміщення та особливих типів переміщення істоти.

onSave.label: Damage on Save
onSave.hint: How much damage should be applied on a successful save?

parts.label: Damage Parts
parts.hint: Individual damage parts to include with the roll.

onSave.label: Always Apply
onSave.hint: This effect will always be applied, even if the target succeeds on its saving throw.

ability.label: Challenge Abilities
ability.hint: Abilities that may be rolled to attempt to save.

calculation.label: DC Calculation
calculation.hint: Method or ability used to calculate the difficulty class.

formula.label: DC Formula
formula.hint: Custom formula or flat value for defining the save DC.

DND5E.SaveGlobalBonusHint: Цей бонус застосовується до всіх рятівних кидків, зроблених цим персонажем.

Explanation.Label: Explanation
Explanation.Hint: Amount of the rules on using spell scrolls to include in the created scroll.

DND5E.SensesConfigHint: Налаштування особливих видів чуття, якими володіє істота.

Bonuses.Label: {label} Bonuses
Bonuses.Hint: These bonuses apply to passive scores & checks made with {label}.

Global.Label: Глобальні бонуси
Global.Hint: These bonuses apply to checks made with any skill.

DND5E.SkillGlobalBonusCheckHint: Цей бонус застосовується до всіх перевірок навичок, зроблених цим персонажем.
DND5E.SpecialHint: Особливі значення, розділені крапкою з комою.
DND5E.SpellCastNoSlots: У вас недостатньо чарунок {level} рівня для створення {name}
DND5E.SpellCastNoSlotsLeft: You have no available spell slots with which to cast {name}!

Warning.Depth: Only three levels of depth allowed in starting equipment.
Warning.ItemTypeInvalid: {type} items cannot be added to starting equipment.

Wealth.Label: Starting Wealth
Wealth.Hint: Formula in GP that can be used in place of starting equipment.

DND5E.SubclassIdentifierHint: Цей ідентифікатор має збігатися з ідентифікатором батьківського класу, щоб переконатися, що вони були правильно пов'язані.
DND5E.SubclassAssignmentError: {class} вже має підклас. Видаліть чинний підклас '{subclass}' перед додаванням нового.
DND5E.SubclassDuplicateError: Підклас з ідентифікатором {identifier} вже існує у цього персонажа.
DND5E.SubclassMismatchWarn: {name} підклас не має відповідного класу з ідентифікатором '{class}'.

ac.label: Bonus Armor Class
ac.hint: Bonus to the Armor Class set on the summoned creature added to what is specified in their statblock.

attackDamage.label: Bonus Attack Damage
attackDamage.hint: Additional damage done by the creature's attacks.

hd.label: Bonus Hit Dice
hd.hint: Додаткова кістка здоров'я додається до істоти поверх тої, що отримується від формули ПЗ в її статблоці. Можна використовувати тільки під час виклику НІП.

healing.label: Bonus Healing
healing.hint: Additional healing provided by healing abilities.

hp.label: Bonus Hit Points
hp.hint: Additional hit points added to the creature on top of what is specified in their statblock.

saveDamage.label: Bonus Save Damage
saveDamage.hint: Additional damage done by the creature's abilities that require saving throws.

creatureSizes.label: Creature Sizes
creatureSizes.hint: Summoned creature and token will be changed to this size. If more than one size is selected, then the player will be able to choose from these sizes when summoning.

creatureTypes.label: Creature Types
creatureTypes.hint: Summoned creature will be changed to this type. If more than one type is selected, then the player will be able to choose from these types when summoning.

ability.label: Match Ability
ability.hint: Specific ability to use when when matching attacks and save DCs.

attacks.label: Match Attacks
attacks.hint: Modify to hit values on the summoned creature's attacks to match that of the summoner.

proficiency.label: Match Proficiency
proficiency.hint: Modify the summoned creature's proficiency to match that of the summoner.

saves.label: Match Saves
saves.hint: Modify saving throw DCs on the summoned creature's abilities to match that of the summoner.

cr.label: Challenge Rating
cr.hint: Maximum CR of the summoned creature.

cr.label: Challenge Rating
cr.hint: Maximum CR of the summoned creature.

level.label: Level Limit
level.hint: Range of levels required to use this profile.

name.label: Display Name
name.hint: Name of the profile displayed in the usage dialog.

types.label: Creature Types
types.hint: List of creature types from which the summoned creature can be selected.

level.label: Level Limit
level.hint: Range of levels required to use this profile.

name.label: Display Name
name.hint: Name of the profile displayed in the usage dialog.

types.label: Creature Types
types.hint: List of creature types from which the summoned creature can be selected.

identifier.label: Class Identifier
identifier.hint: Identifier used to determine whether the character level or a specific class level should be used for profile level limits.

mode.label: Mode
mode.hint: Sets how the creatures that are to be summoned are specified.

prompt.label: Summon Prompt
prompt.hint: Should the player be prompted to place the summons? Players will still be able to summon from the chat card if prompt is disabled.

CreatureChanges.Label: Creature Changes
CreatureChanges.Hint: Changes that will be made to the creature being summoned. Any @ references used in the following formulas will be based on the summoner's stats. Summoned creatures' stats can be referenced using @summon (e.g. @summon.attributes.hd.max to reference the creature's hit dice count).

ItemChanges.Label: Item Changes
ItemChanges.Hint: Changes made to items on the summoned creature.

Profile.Label: Summons Profile
Profile.Empty: Click the button above to create a profile.
Profile.EmptyDrop: Click the button above to create a profile or drop a creature to summon here.

Warning.CreateActor: You must have 'Create New Actors' permission in order to summon directly from a compendium.
Warning.CRV11: Summoning based on creature challenge rating only works in Foundry V12 or higher.
Warning.NoActor: Actor cannot be found with UUID '{uuid}' to summon.
Warning.NoOwnership: You must have ownership of '{actor}' in order to summon it.
Warning.Wildcard: You must have 'Use File Browser' permissions to summon creatures with wildcard artwork.

choice.label: Choose Targets
choice.hint: When targeting an area, can the user choose who it affects?

count.label: Target Count
count.hint: Number of individual targets that can be affected.

special.label: Special Targeting
special.hint: Description of any special targeting details.

type.label: Target Type
type.hint: Type of targets that can be affected (e.g. creatures, objects, spaces).

override.label: Override Target
override.hint: Use these target values instead of the item's when using this activity.

prompt.label: Підказка для шаблону зони дії
prompt.hint: Чи потрібно підказувати гравцеві розмістити вимірювальний шаблон? Гравці зможуть розміщувати шаблони з картки чату навіть якщо підказка вимкнена.

contiguous.label: Contiguous Areas
contiguous.hint: Must all created areas be connected to one another?

count.label: Area Count
count.hint: Number of distinct areas that can be targeted.

height.label: Area Height
height.hint: Height of a cylinder affected if applicable.

size.label: Area Size
size.hint: Size of the area of effect on its primary axis.

type.label: Area Type
type.hint: Type of area of effect targeted.

units.label: Area Units
units.hint: Units used to measure the area of effect sizes.

width.label: Area Width
width.hint: Width of a line affected if applicable.

DND5E.TemplatePromptTooltip: If unchecked, the prompt for placing a Measured Template will be suppressed.

Subject.Label: Subject Path
Subject.Hint: Explicitly specify a path for the artwork placed over the dynamic token ring. If not provided, the subject image will be set to the normal token artwork.

Bonuses.Hint: These bonuses apply to checks made with {label}.

Global.Label: Глобальні бонуси
Global.Hint: These bonuses apply to checks made with any tool.

level.label: Level Limit
level.hint: Range of levels required to use this profile.

movement.hint: Movement types that are not allowed on source creatures.

sizes.hint: List of creature sizes from which the source creature can be selected.

customize.label: Customize
customize.hint: Use custom transformation settings rather than the defaults provided by the selected preset.

identifier.label: Class Identifier

mode.label: Mode
mode.hint: Sets how the transformation source creatures are selected.

Profile.Empty: Click the button above to create a profile.
Profile.Label: Transform Profile

All.Hint: Keep all effects, ignoring any other effects settings.
All.Label: All Effects

Origin.Hint: Keep any effects created directly on this source actor.
Origin.Label: This Actor

OtherOrigin.Hint: Keep any effects imposed by an outside actor.
OtherOrigin.Label: Other Actors

keep.hint: These details will be retained from the source actor.
keep.label: Keep

merge.hint: Merge these proficiencies, keeping whichever has the higher modifier.
merge.label: Merge

tempFormula.hint: Formula for temp HP that will be added upon transformation.
tempFormula.label: Temp Formula

Mental.Hint: Keep intelligence, wisdom, and charisma scores.
Mental.Label: Mental Abilities

Physical.Hint: Keep strength, dexterity, and constitution scores.
Physical.Label: Physical Abilities

Self.Hint: Only change portrait and token artwork, other settings will be ignored.
Self.Label: Self

Warning.NoOwnership: You do not have permission to transform this actor.
Warning.NoPermission: Transformation permission haven't been granted to players.
Warning.OriginalActor: No original actor was found with ID '{reference}'.
Warning.SourceActor: No actor found to transform into.

DND5E.Unidentified.Notice: You must identify this item to learn its details.
DND5E.Unidentified.Title: Unidentified

max.label: Maximum Uses
max.hint: Formula for the maximum number of uses.

recovery.label: Use Recovery
recovery.hint: Recovery profiles for this activity's uses.

period.label: Recovery Period
period.hint: Time when this recovery will occur.

formula.label: Recovery Formula
formula.hint: Formula used to determine how many uses are recovered.

spent.label: Spent Uses
spent.hint: Number of uses that have been spent.

name.label: Назва кидка
name.hint: Назва, яка відображається на кнопці кидка.

prompt.label: Запит кидка
prompt.hint: Чи слід показувати діалогове вікно налаштувань перед кидком?

visible.label: Видима всім
visible.hint: Чи повинна кнопка кидка бути видимою для всіх гравців?

cover.label: Cover
cover.hint: Cover provided to crew operating this equipment.

DND5E.WarnBadACFormula: Введена формула КЗ "{formula}" не може бути розрахована.
DND5E.WarnCantAddMultipleAdvancements: Наразі неможливо додати кілька елементів з розвитком до актора одночасно. Будь ласка, додайте їх окремо.
DND5E.WarnMultipleArmor: Надягнено більше одного комплекту обладунків. Розрахунок КЗ може бути некоректним.
DND5E.WarnMultipleShields: Надягнено більше одного комплекту обладунків. Розрахунок КЗ може бути некоректним.

damage.hint: Intrinsic damage dice from the weapon. Ability modifier and additional damage parts will be provided automatically when attacking.

mastery.label: Mastery
mastery.hint: Special weapon ability unlocked for characters who have Weapon Mastery or a related feature.

DND5E.description: Система Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition в Foundry Virtual Tabletop.

EDITOR.DND5E.Inline.NoActorWarning: No selected or assigned actor could be found to execute this roll.

Warning.NoActivityOnItem: {item} on {actor} does not have an Activity with name {activity}.
Warning.NoActor: No selected or assigned actor could be found to execute this roll.
Warning.NoItemOnActor: {actor} does not have an Item with name {item}.

additionalEquipment.label: Additional Equipment Description
additionalEquipment.hint: Additional descriptive text displayed beneath the starting equipment section.

additionalHitPoints.label: Additional Hit Points Description
additionalHitPoints.hint: Additional descriptive text displayed beneath the auto-generated hit points section.

additionalTraits.label: Additional Proficiencies Description
additionalTraits.hint: Additional descriptive text displayed beneath list of proficiencies granted by this class.

subclass.label: Subclass Introduction
subclass.hint: Introduction that will be displayed before this class's subclasses.

value.label: Introduction
value.hint: Primary description of the class that will appear first.

style.label: Style
style.hint: Force the page style to use modern or legacy formatting, rather than what is specified by the class.

Class.EquipmentDescription: You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

Features.DescriptionLegacy: As a {lowercaseName}, you gain the following class features, which are summarized in the {name} table.
Features.DescriptionModern: As a {name}, you gain the following class features when you reach the specified {name} levels. These features are listed in the {name} Features table.
Features.Name: Level {level}: {name}

HitPoints.Level1: Hit Points at 1st Level: {max} + your Constitution modifier
HitPoints.LevelX: Hit Points at Higher Levels: {dice} (or {average}) + your Constitution modifier per {class} level after 1st

Class.NoValidClass: No valid class selected, press the edit button to add a class.
Class.OptionalFeaturesDescription: The following section contains options {class} features. These features are not granted automatically, and you can choose one, some, or all of them at your DM's discretion.

SpellList.DropHint: Drop spells or folders of spells here to add to the list

Grouping.Label: Grouping Mode
Grouping.Hint: Controls how the spells will be grouped by default in the spell list.

SpellList.IdentifierHint: Identifier should match that defined on the associated document, if applicable. For example, when creating a spell list for the Wizard class, the identifier should be 'wizard'.

value.label: Introduction
value.hint: Description of the subclass that will appear before any listed features.

style.label: Style
style.hint: Force the page style to use modern or legacy formatting, rather than what is specified by the subclass.

Subclass.NoValidSubclass: No valid subclass selected, press the edit button to add a subclass.

MACRO.5eMissingTargetWarn: Ваш контрольований актор '{actor}' не має {type} з назвою '{name}'.
MACRO.5eMultipleTargetsWarn: Ваш контрольований актор '{actor}' має більше одного {type} з назвою '{name}'. Буде обраний перший предмет.
MACRO.5eNoActorSelected: Не знайдено вибраних або прив'язаних акторів для використання макроса.
MACRO.5eUnownedWarn: Ви можете створити лише макроси для предметів, що належать вам
MIGRATION.5eBegin: Обробляємо дані системи DnD5E для версії {version}. Будь ласка, будьте терплячі та не закривайте вашу гру чи сервер.
MIGRATION.5eComplete: Оновлення системи DnD5E до версії {version} завершено!
MIGRATION.5eVersionTooOldWarning: Дані вашого світу DnD5e завантажені з занадто старої версії Foundry та не можуть бути надійно перенесені до останньої версії. Ви можете спробувати, але можуть виникнути помилки.
SETTINGS.5eAutoCollapseCardL: Автоматично згортати опис на картках предметів в чаті
SETTINGS.5eAutoSpellTemplateL: При створенні чарів буде автоматично створюватися вимірювальний шаблон (гравець повинен мати роль TRUSTED або вищу)
SETTINGS.5eNoAdvancementsL: Не показувати вікно підвищення рівня і вибору варіантів розвитку персонажа.
SETTINGS.5eNoConcentrationL: Disable the system's automated tracking of concentration.
SETTINGS.5eGridAlignedSquareTemplatesL: When square templates are created as the result of casting a spell or using an item, they will be locked to the grid alignment and unable to be rotated.

BLOODIED.Name: Bloodied Status
BLOODIED.Hint: Configure whether the bloodied status is tracked automatically and its visibility.

COLLAPSETRAYS.Name: Collapse Trays in Chat
COLLAPSETRAYS.Hint: Automatically collapse damage, hit, and effect trays that appear in chat cards.

COMBAT.Hint: Various configuration options that affect combat.
COMBAT.Label: Configure Combat
COMBAT.Name: Combat

DexTiebreaker.Name: Dexterity Tiebreaker
DexTiebreaker.Hint: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.

InitiativeScore.Name: Initiative Score
InitiativeScore.Hint: Use a creature's initiative score (10 + bonus) rather than rolling for initiative.

MaxDice.Name: Maximize Dice
MaxDice.Hint: Make critical hits more deadly by maximizing the values of base damage dice.

MultiplyModifiers.Name: Multiply Modifiers
MultiplyModifiers.Hint: Make critical hits more deadly by multiplying non-dice modifiers in addition to rolled dice.

DEFAULTSKILLS.Name: Default Skills
DEFAULTSKILLS.Hint: Навички за замовчуванням, які з'являються на аркушах НІП незалежно від рівня майстерності.

LengthUnits.Name: Use Metric Length Units
LengthUnits.Hint: Defaults to using meters instead of feet for movement and senses.

VolumeUnits.Name: Use Metric Volume Units
VolumeUnits.Hint: Defaults to using liters instead of cubic feet for container capacity.

WeightUnits.Name: Use Metric Weight Units
WeightUnits.Hint: Replaces all reference to lbs with kgs and updates the encumbrance calculations to use metric weight units.

AutoRecharge.Name: Recharge Abilities
AutoRecharge.Hint: Roll to recharge NPC abilities automatically at the start of the NPC's turn.

AutoRollNPCHP.Name: Hit Points
AutoRollNPCHP.Hint: Configure whether to roll for NPC max HP whenever a new token is created.

THEME.Name: Theme
THEME.Hint: Theme that will apply to the UI and all sheets by default. Automatic will be determined by your browser or operating system settings.

AllowSummoning.Hint: Allow players to use summoning abilities to summon actors. Players must also have the Create Token core permission for this to work.
AllowSummoning.Name: Allow Summoning

AllowTransformation.Hint: Allow players to transform their own actors. Players must also have the Create Actor core permission for this to work.
AllowTransformation.Name: Allow Transformation

RULESVERSION.Name: Rules Version
RULESVERSION.Hint: Change handling of various rules between the 2024 and 2014 rule sets.

VARIANT.Hint: Enable and configure rules variations offered by the system.
VARIANT.Label: Configure Variant Rules
VARIANT.Name: Variant Rules

AllowFeats.Hint: Allow players to choose a feat rather than taking an ability score improvement during class advancement when using the Legacy rules.
AllowFeats.Name: Allow Feats

Encumbrance.Hint: Enable automatic tracking of encumbrance and the application of status effects for characters carrying too much.
Encumbrance.Name: Encumbrance Tracking

HonorScore.Hint: Enable the use of the optional Honor ability score.
HonorScore.Name: Honor Ability Score

LevelingMode.Hint: Determine how the players gain new levels.
LevelingMode.Name: Leveling Mode

ProficiencyModifier.Hint: Configure proficiency modifier to use a fixed bonus or a dice roll.
ProficiencyModifier.Name: Proficiency Variant

Rest.Hint: Configure which rest variant should be used for games within this system.
Rest.Name: Rest Variant

SanityScore.Hint: Enable the use of the optional Sanity ability score.
SanityScore.Name: Sanity Ability Score

VISIBILITY.Hint: Various configuration options that affect player visibility of certain information that the DM may wish to keep secret.
VISIBILITY.Label: Configure Visibility
VISIBILITY.Name: Visibility

Attack.Name: Attack Result Visibility
Attack.Hint: Control visibility of attack roll results in chat cards for players.

Challenge.Hint: Control what roll DCs are visible to the players and whether successes/failures are highlighted.
Challenge.Name: Challenge Visibility

ItemDescriptions.Hint: Hide the descriptions of NPC items from players when posted to chat by the DM. Will only hide the descriptions for items without a Chat Description set.
ItemDescriptions.Name: Conceal NPC Descriptions
